reasons_to_visit.details: March marks the beginning of spring with longer days and the first signs of seasonal awakening.
Enjoy the town before tourist season begins, with peaceful exploration opportunities.
March offers both winter charm with possible snow and early spring elements.
All indoor attractions remain accessible while outdoor conditions gradually improve.

reasons_to_avoid.details: March weather can be highly variable, alternating between winter cold and spring warmth.
River activities not yet available, and castle gardens may still be closed.
Snow melt and spring rains can create muddy and less pleasant walking conditions.
